description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science who are pursuing a degree in the Department of Biology. Eligibility Requirements? College of Mathematics and Science student Major in Biology Minimum GPA of 3.0 Must have completed 60 hours of credit towards degree Demonstrate financial need Two faculty letters of recommendation

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
